title: Emtype Foundry
content:
**[Indices](http://web.archive.org/web/20150204230756/http:/typophile.com/wiki/Indices) : [Foundries](http://web.archive.org/web/20150204230756/http:/typophile.com/wiki/Foundries) : Emtype**

Emtype is a “small” type foundry currently based in Barcelona, Spain, founded by [Eduardo Manso](http://web.archive.org/web/20150204230756/http:/typophile.com/wiki/Eduardo%20Manso). He has designed and published several types through [International Typeface Corporation](http://web.archive.org/web/20150204230756/http:/typophile.com/wiki/International%20Typeface%20Corporation) (ITC), [Bitstream](http://web.archive.org/web/20150204230756/http:/typophile.com/wiki/Bitstream), [T-26](http://web.archive.org/web/20150204230756/http:/typophile.com/wiki/T26) and [Linotype](http://web.archive.org/web/20150204230756/http:/typophile.com/wiki/Linotype). The “Emtype Foundry philosophy” is to produce types of high quality, as much for display as for text use.  
 [http://www.emtype.net](http://web.archive.org/web/20150204230756/http:/www.emtype.net/ "http://www.emtype.net")
author: emtype
